verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> I was jealous <WH7065> for Zion <WH6726> with great <WH1419> jealousy, <WH7068> and I was jealous <WH7065> for her with great <WH1419> fury. <WH2534>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> I am returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> Zion, <WH6726> and will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of Jerusalem: <WH3389> and Jerusalem <WH3389> shall be called <WH7121> a city <WH5892> of truth; <WH571> and the mountain <WH2022> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> the holy <WH6944> mountain. <WH2022>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> There shall yet <WH5750> old men <WH2205> and old women <WH2205> dwell <WH3427> in the streets <WH7339> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and every man <WH376> with his staff <WH4938> in his hand <WH3027> for very <WH4480> <WH7230> age. <WH3117>
And the streets <WH7339> of the city <WH5892> shall be full <WH4390> of boys <WH3206> and girls <WH3207> playing <WH7832> in the streets <WH7339> thereof.

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> If <WH3588> it be marvelous <WH6381> in the eyes <WH5869> of the remnant <WH7611> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> in these <WH1992> days, <WH3117> should it also <WH1571> be marvelous <WH6381> in mine eyes? <WH5869> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> Behold, <WH2009> I will save <WH3467> <WH853> my people <WH5971> from the east <WH4217> country, <WH4480> <WH776> and from the west <WH3996> <WH8121> country; <WH4480> <WH776>

And I will bring <WH935> them, and they shall dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of Jerusalem: <WH3389> and they shall be <WH1961> my people, <WH5971> and I <WH589> will be <WH1961> their God, <WH430> in truth <WH571> and in righteousness. <WH6666>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> Let your hands <WH3027> be strong, <WH2388> ye that hear <WH8085> in these <WH428> days <WH3117> <WH853> these <WH428> words <WH1697> by the mouth <WH4480> <WH6310> of the prophets, <WH5030> which <WH834> were in the day <WH3117> that the foundation of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> was laid, <WH3245> that the temple <WH1964> might be built. <WH1129>

For <WH3588> before <WH6440> these <WH1992> days <WH3117> there was <WH1961> no <WH3808> hire <WH7939> for man, <WH120> nor <WH369> any hire <WH7939> for beast; <WH929> neither <WH369> was there any peace <WH7965> to him that went out <WH3318> or came in <WH935> because of <WH4480> the affliction: <WH6862> for I set <WH7971> <WH853> all <WH3605> men <WH120> every one <WH376> against his neighbor. <WH7453>
But now <WH6258> I <WH589> will not <WH3808> be unto the residue <WH7611> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> as in the former <WH7223> days, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>

For <WH3588> the seed <WH2233> shall be prosperous; <WH7965> the vine <WH1612> shall give <WH5414> her fruit, <WH6529> and the ground <WH776> shall give <WH5414> <WH853> her increase, <WH2981> and the heavens <WH8064> shall give <WH5414> their dew; <WH2919> and I will cause <WH853> the remnant <WH7611> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> to possess <WH5157> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things.

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that as <WH834> ye were <WH1961> a curse <WH7045> among the heathen, <WH1471> O house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> and house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> so <WH3651> will I save <WH3467> you, and ye shall be <WH1961> a blessing: <WH1293> fear <WH3372> not, <WH408> but let your hands <WH3027> be strong. <WH2388>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> As <WH834> I thought <WH2161> to punish <WH7489> you, when your fathers <WH1> provoked me to wrath, <WH7107> <WH853> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> and I repented <WH5162> not: <WH3808>

So <WH3651> again <WH7725> have I thought <WH2161> in these <WH428> days <WH3117> to do well <WH3190> unto <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> and to the house <WH1004> of Judah: <WH3063> fear <WH3372> ye not. <WH408>

These <WH428> are the things <WH1697> that <WH834> ye shall do; <WH6213> Speak <WH1696> ye every man <WH376> the truth <WH571> to <WH854> his neighbor; <WH7453> execute <WH8199> the judgment <WH4941> of truth <WH571> and peace <WH7965> in your gates: <WH8179>

And let none <WH408> <WH376> of you imagine <WH2803> <WH853> evil <WH7451> in your hearts <WH3824> against his neighbor; <WH7453> and love <WH157> no <WH408> false <WH8267> oath: <WH7621> for <WH3588> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> are things that <WH834> I hate, <WH8130> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> The fast <WH6685> of the fourth <WH7243> month, and the fast <WH6685> of the fifth, <WH2549> and the fast <WH6685> of the seventh, <WH7637> and the fast <WH6685> of the tenth, <WH6224> shall be <WH1961> to the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> joy <WH8342> and gladness, <WH8057> and cheerful <WH2896> feasts; <WH4150> therefore love <WH157> the truth <WH571> and peace. <WH7965>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> It shall yet <WH5750> come to pass, that <WH834> there shall come <WH935> people, <WH5971> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of many <WH7227> cities: <WH5892>

And the inhabitants <WH3427> of one <WH259> city shall go <WH1980> to <WH413> another, <WH259> saying, <WH559> Let us go speedily <WH1980> <WH1980> to pray <WH2470> <WH853> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and to seek <WH1245> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts: <WH6635> I <WH589> will go <WH1980> also. <WH1571>

Yea, many <WH7227> people <WH5971> and strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> shall come <WH935> to seek <WH1245> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> and to pray <WH2470> <WH853> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> In those <WH1992> days <WH3117> it shall come to pass, that <WH834> ten <WH6235> men <WH376> shall take hold <WH2388> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> languages <WH3956> of the nations, <WH1471> even shall take hold <WH2388> of the skirt <WH3671> of him <WH376> that is a Jew, <WH3064> saying, <WH559> We will go <WH1980> with <WH5973> you: for <WH3588> we have heard <WH8085> that God <WH430> is with <WH5973> you.
